backend/main.mo: Defines bond, investment, and user profile types with maps and access-controlled queries and updates for profiles and bond listings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a logo replacement task with related components and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and deployment guide contents.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions for publishing the app and configuring DNS for fundgrowth.in.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining the full OKLCH color system and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root container and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, route tree, and theme provider for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth-gated wrapper that shows a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Toggle button handling Internet Identity login and logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit basic profile data and KYC status.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondCard.t: Card UI component rendering core bond details, risk tags, and a link to the bond detail page.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondFilter: UI component providing search, sort, and risk-tag filters for bond listings with clear-filter support.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedBon: Fetches and displays the top three bond listings with loading skeletons and a link to view all bonds.
Layout wrapper with header, footer, routed content, and a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with navigation links, branding, legal links, and a dynamic attribution section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, authentication-aware UI, and a mobile dropdown menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login/logout logic and exposes authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks for bonds, portfolio data, and investment actions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, global styles, and a custom container class.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides formatting utilities for currency, rates, tenure, dates, rating colors, and risk tag labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BondDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed bond information with rating, status, attributes, and an invest action with authentication handling.
frontend/src/pages/BondsPage.tsx: Lists all bonds with search, filtering by risk tags, sorting, and renders bond cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with submission toast and displays contact information.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows authenticated user’s portfolio summary and active investments with stats and tables.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Displays an accordion of common FAQs about bonds and platform usage.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing homepage with hero section, feature list, and featured bonds component.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the four-step bond investment process with cards and a section on bond benefits.
frontend/src/pages/InvestPage.tsx: Handles the authenticated bond investment flow including amount entry, review, confirmation, and success state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the FUNDGROWTH platform, features, requirements, and version state.
